body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is William Flores and the customer's name is Theresa Lopez.  The conversation is about Old Stone Stocks (a Brokerage Company ) and is a conversation about privacy.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! My name is Sarah and I'm here to assist you today. I represent Quick Solutions, a company dedicated to providing exceptional customer service.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Sarah, nice to meet you.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: It's great to meet you too! May I have your name so I can address you properly?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, John! To help you further, could you please provide me with your email address?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Perfect! And could you let me know your phone number, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: My phone number is five five five one two three four.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for that information, John. I appreciate your cooperation!

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time today, John. If you have any other questions, feel free to reach out. Have a wonderful day!
